about_the_game: Kill them all is a linear narrative game where you play a mercenary who will be deployed on Serenity island. The island is facing a serious epidemic and does not have the military capabilities to manage the situation properly. You will be mandated to carry out various missions.
detailed_description: Kill them all is a linear narrative game where you play a mercenary who will be deployed on Serenity island. The island is facing a serious epidemic and does not have the military capabilities to manage the situation properly. You will be mandated to carry out various missions.
legal_notice: © 2022 Kickback games, Jeux Kickback, Kill them all are registered. All Rights Reserved.
name: Kill them all Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In this narrative action-adventure game, you play a fearless mercenary deployed on Serenity Island where an infection rages. Fight infected, complete missions, and improve your equipment. Many survivors need assistance, would you be able to help?
